job.title: Staff Software Engineer - Tracking Data Quality (Systems & Infrastructure)
job.description: ltbrgtstaff software engineer systems infrastructure tdq teamltbrgtsunnyvale ca ltbrgt ltbrgt ltbrgtlinkedin was built to help professionals achieve more in their careers and everyday millions of people use our products to make connections discover opportunities and gain insights our global reach means we get to make a direct impact on the worlds workforce in ways no other company can we are much more than a digital resume we transform lives through innovative products and technology ltbrgt ltbrgtcreating economic opportunity for every member of the global workforce is a responsibility we all share to truly transform the global economy we must evolve the way we hire and enable our talent to serve people of all backgrounds and experiences linkedin is committed to diversity in its workforce and is proud to be an equal opportunity employer ltbrgt ltbrgtthe total data quality tdq team builds highquality software systems and infrastructure solutions as a staff software engineer you will be an agile architect in the design development and support of the most visible internetscale features and infrastructures at linkedin the ideal candidate will be excited for the challenge to transform and think critically on many computer science disciplines including product design usability building apis and usercentric online applications business logic scaling performance and x reliability ltbrgtltbrgtthis position is fulltime and based in our office in sunnyvale ca office ltbrgtltbrgtresponsibilities ltbrgtltbrgt scale distributed applications make architectural tradeoffs applying synchronous and asynchronous design patterns write code and deliver with speediness and qualityltbrgt develop multitier scalable highvolume performing and reliable usercentric applications that operate xltbrgt produce high quality software that is unit tested code reviewed and checked in regularly for continuous integrationltbrgt provide technical leadership driving and performing best engineering practices to initiate plan and execute largescale cross functional and companywise critical programsltbrgt identify leverage and successfully evangelize opportunities to improve engineering productivityltbrgtltbrgt basic qualifications ltbrgtltbrgt bs in computer science or related technical field or equivalent technical experience ltbrgt years of industry experience ltbrgt experience in mentoringleading junior engineers ltbrgt ltbrgtpreferred qualifications ltbrgtltbrgt years of relevant work experience including work as a senior software engineer or staff software engineer responsible for providing technical guidance to teams of engineers ltbrgt ms or phd in computer science or related technical discipline ltbrgt experience in designing and building infrastructure and web services at large scale ltbrgt thorough knowledge of multithreading concurrency and parallel processing technologies ltbrgt experience in building distributed internetscale systems ltbrgt experience in opensource projects andor academic research in large data ltbrgtltbrgtyou will benefit from our culture ltbrgtltbrgtwe strongly believe in the wellbeing of our employees and their families that is why we offer generous health and wellness programs and time away for employees of all levels ltbrgt ltbrgtltbrgtltbrgtequal opportunity statementltbrgtlinkedin is committed to diversity in its workforce and is proud to be an equal opportunity employer linkedin considers qualified applicants without regard to race color religion creed gender national origin age disability veteran status marital status pregnancy sex gender expression or identity sexual orientation citizenship or any other legally protected class linkedin is an httpwwweeocgovemployersuploadeeocselfprintposterpdf and httpswwwdolgovofccpregscomplianceposterspdfofccpeeosupplementfinaljrfqacpdf for more informationltbrgtltbrgtlinkedin is committed to offering an inclusive and accessible experience for all job seekers including individuals with disabilities our goal is to foster an inclusive and accessible workplace where everyone has the opportunity to be successful ltbrgt ltbrgtif you need a reasonable accommodation to search for a job opening apply for a position or participate in the interview process connect with us at accommodationslinkedincom and describe the specific accommodation requested for a disabilityrelated limitation ltbrgt ltbrgtreasonable accommodations are modifications or adjustments to the application or hiring process that would enable you to fully participate in that process examples of reasonable accommodations include but are not limited to ltbrgt ltbrgtdocuments in alternate formats or read aloud to you ltbrgthaving interviews in an accessible locationltbrgtbeing accompanied by a service dogltbrgthaving a sign language interpreter present for the interviewltbrgt ltbrgta request for an accommodation will be responded to within three business days however nondisability related requests such as following up on an application will not receive a responseltbrgtltbrgtlinkedin will not discharge or in any other manner discriminate against employees or applicants because they have inquired about discussed or disclosed their own pay or the pay of another employee or applicant however employees who have access to the compensation information of other employees or applicants as a part of their essential job functions cannot disclose the pay of other employees or applicants to individuals who do not otherwise have access to compensation information unless the disclosure is a in response to a formal complaint or charge b in furtherance of an investigation proceeding hearing or action including an investigation conducted by linkedin or c consistent with linkedins legal duty to furnish informationltbrgtltbrgtpay transparency policy statementltbrgtas a federal contractor linkedin follows the pay transparency and nondiscrimination provisions described at this link httpslnkdinpaytransparencyltbrgtltbrgtglobal data privacy notice for job candidatesltbrgtthis document provides transparency around
